name: outputenvironmentns
description: Generates a K8s namespace name for the release environment, based on branch, whether this is a pull request, and desired service name.
author: Ahmed Sabbour

inputs.name: servicename
inputs.label: Service name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the service. Will be used in `<servicename>-<env>-<build number>`

inputs.name: environment
inputs.label: Environment suffix
inputs.helpMarkDown: Environment, for example `dev`, `preview`, `preprod`, `prod`. Will be used in `<servicename>-<env>-<build number>`. If blank, then the resulting hostname will be in the form of `<servicename>-<build number>.<clustersuffix>`

outputvariables.name: namespace
outputvariables.description: The namespace appropriate to use with this release.
